Question: What accolades did the film 'Gangubai Kathiawadi' receive upon its release in 2022?
Options:
A. Best Actress Award at the National Film Awards
B. Best Director Award at the Cannes Film Festival
C. Best Film at the Filmfare Awards
D. Best Cinematography at the Oscars
Answer: Best Film at the Filmfare Awards

Options:
A. The box office performance of Gangubai Kathiawadi
